imgDetails.title: INNOVERSE
imgDetails.text: At Innoverse, we bring open-source enthusiasts and entrepreneurs together and share new ideas and learn from industry experts. â€œINNOVATION is taking two things that exist and putting them together in a new way. What good is an idea if it remains an idea? TRY. EXPERIMENT. FAIL.TRY AGAIN. CHANGE THE WORLD.

imgDetails.title: IDEATHON
imgDetails.text: An open-source Ideathon, to bring out the best of both enthusiasts and entrepreneurs in this field. This is a fantastic learning opportunity for anyone interested in open-source and project management

imgDetails.title: CONVOKE 5.0
imgDetails.text: Cluster Innovation Centre, at the heart of Delhi University's North Campus, is organizing DU's biggest Tech Fest (CONVOKE 5.0) on the 11th and 12th of February 2023.
